DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate effect short-time high-intensity interval training tissue glucose fat metabolism healthy lean subject type 2 diabetic patient use modern noninvasive imaging method positron emission tomography ( PET ) , magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) magnetic resonance spectroscopy ( MRS ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Short-time High-intensity Interval Training Tissue Glucose Fat Metabolism Healthy Subjects Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: The healthy patient 1 . Age 4055 2 . BMI 18.530 3 . Fasting plasma glucose less 6.1 mmol/l 4 . Normal glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) The type 2 diabetic patient : 1 . Age , sex , BMImatched study subject phase 1 2 . In good treatment balance 3 . Glycated haemoglobin ( HbA1c ) less 7.5 mmol/l 4 . Two hour glucose value oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) less 10.0 mmol/l The healthy patient 1 . Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg 2 . Any chronic disease 3 . Any chronic medical defect injury hinder/interfere everyday life 4 . History anorexia nervosa bulimia 5 . History rest exerciseinduced asthma 6 . Previous use anabolic steroid , additives substrate 7 . Smoking tobacco , take snuff , use narcotic . 8 . Significant use alcohol 9 . Any condition opinion investigator could create hazard subject safety , endanger study procedure interfere interpretation study result 10 .
